definitions.definition: Characterized or marked by full, generous , pleasurable sensation .
examples: The plentiful blankets and the voluptuous pillows of the bed called out to my tired body.
The low neckline of her bodice emphasized her plump, voluptuous figure.

main_definition: Characterized or marked by full, generous , pleasurable sensation .
secondary_definitions: ( of a woman ) Curvaceous and sexually attractive .
